entrance.title: Welcome to HollyPolly - Draw & Random Team Creator App!
entrance.firstUser: You're the first! As admin, you can set the room title.

info.title: What is HollyPolly?
info.description: HollyPolly is a real-time application that lets you draw lots and create random teams with your friends.
info.step1: 1. Create a room and share it with your friends (You can share directly using the Share Draw Room button)
info.step2: 2. Add options (e.g., who cooks, who cleans)
info.step3: 3. Use Winner/Loser buttons or Create Random Teams
info.step4: 4. Result is shown to everyone at the same time!

teams.title: Random Teams
teams.firstTime: Teams created for the first time.
